summary: BuildRequest specifies no requirements and no acceptance criteria. The diff only modifies `project_state.json`, adding/recording multiple Valentine-page features and associated REQ IDs plus new feature requests, which were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/recorded multiple requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-6) and corresponding Valentine page feature descriptions (Yes/No prompt, dodging No button, Yes shows meme + “Good choice❤❤❤”, pink/white theme, static assets path, iPad Chrome client-side constraints) despite the BuildRequest stating there are no requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists “Requirements: none”, yet the diff adds feature entries with REQ IDs and detailed functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a set of new feature requests (AR-1 through AR-4) marked as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: No new feature requests were asked for; the ticket is explicitly a no-op and lists non-goals against adding extra steps/features.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/recorded an architectural note suggesting a single self-contained HTML file with embedded CSS/JS.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also may conflict with an existing app structure, but the BuildRequest provides no requirement to change architecture.
